message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/Listado_de_ontolog%C3%ADas 

Metadata Vocabularies
Ontology Metadata Vocabulary: OMV
Metadata for describing resources: NorMV
Provenance
PROV-O: The PROV Ontology (@W3C). Estandar.
El Viajero Ontology (Extiende OPM). No estandard.
Geography
Hydrology: hydrOntology (@IGN, CNIG)
Topographic: PhenomenOntology (@IGN, CNIG)
NeoGeo vocabulary (input for W3C Spatial Data on the Web)
Internet of Things
SSN: Semantic Sensor Network Ontology (@W3C)
AEMET (extiende SSN). No estandar
User Context (@mIO!) (No estandarizada)
(Multi)-Media
Ontology for Media Resources 1.0 (@W3C)
M3 ontology (@Buscamedia) (No estandarizada)
Technology Watch
xxx
Knowledge Management
Human Resources management ontology (@ SEEMP)
Research project management ontologies (No estandarizada)
Libraries
Bibliography registries (@BNE)
e-Science
SMART Protocols. No estandar.
Research Object Ontologies (@researchobject.org). No estandar.
Wfprov (workflow provenance)
Wfdesc (workflow description)
RO (Research Object)
Roevo (RO evolution)
WICUS Ontology network,
http://purl.org/net/wicus
. No estandar.
P-Plan (Provenance and Plans). No estandar, pero extiende el estandar.
Wf-invocation. No estandar (extiende p-plan)
The Open Provenance Model for Workflows (OPMW) (provenance and e-Science). No estandar, pero extiende el estandar.
Workflow Motif Ontology. No estandar.
Workflow Fragment Description Ontology (wf-fd). No estandar.
CCon Ontology (cerrado). No estandar.
Health
ICPS (International Classification for Patient Safety) (@WHO)
Software Engineering
SEALS ontologies. No estándar.
Quality model ontology. No estándar.
ALM iStack ontology. No estándar, extiende OSLC.
AENOR vocabularies for smart cities
At vocab.linkeddata.es/datosabiertos/
Linguistics
Lemon (The Lexicon Model for Ontologies). De facto standard
Lemon translation module.
Lemon-ontolex. Under standardisation.
Tourism
Geobuddies Ontology (@Geobuddies) (No estandarizada)
speaker: SYSTEM
